mapper.select: SELECT info.id, info.odd, cp.name as company, info.rec_name as name, info.rec_tel as tel, info.status AS order_status, payment.status AS payment_status, info.create_date FROM order_payment as payment, order_info as info LEFT JOIN data_company as cp ON info.company = cp.id WHERE info.id = payment.order_id AND info.has_delete = #{has_delete} ${sql}
